attributes.review: When I downloaded this app I was excited to see the orange man himself🍊 but instead I saw his Cheeto puff pp✨ I would like you to know that I am underage and this is illegal. I then exited the app but I couldn’t it would not let me and I didn’t no why. Out of no where a tornado messed up my room and there was animals in there and it was yelling “trump 2020” almost like jamanji and I was sucked in to it and I can’t get out so in all reality I am kidnapped by the orange 🍊 help
attributes.title: Why though

attributes.review: Trump is a business man, not a politician. He should stick to running golf courses and casinos, not one of the most powerful countries in the world. He does not have the competence to run a country. And because of his incompetence, thousands of Americans have lost their lives and millions of people across the world are dying because this Cheeto is to selfish to care about anyone else besides him self. Gen Z is taking over, you can go back to where you came from!! 🧚🏻🌸✨💕👑💫
attributes.title: Tumpa Lumpa

attributes.review: I was really looking forward to finally having access to the campaign information of my WONDERFUL president, but I could not have been more disappointed. App took days to download and attempted to gain access to all of my info! Even more, I felt myself morphing into a racist, sexist, xenophobic billionaire with no regard for the majority of America. So scary! I couldn’t deal with it. Overall, I regrettably and unfortunately must rate this app 0 stars out of 5
attributes.title: Unsatisfactory App

attributes.review: I’ve never downloaded a worse app before!!!! This app took almost 36 hours to download! Not only that but the first screen you see contains graph photos of some strange Cheeto man!! Truly scarring. If all of this wasn’t enough, this app is the most bigoted thing I’ve seen! Racism, homophobia, sexism, Islamophobia, xenophobia, fascist, ablist!!!!! Very disgusted and had to remove from my phone immediately... do better, apple store. Why would you allow such a horrible app?
attributes.title: Oh my-

attributes.review: i cant believe i actually wasted my time downloading this app. it’s literally the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. i don’t recommend AT ALL. this app needs to be taken down before it drives someone insane, that’s how terrible it is. i hate to say it, but this app probably caused many deaths 😔. trump needs to be re elected, and quick. he is tearing our country apart. this app needs to be taken down ASAP. i’m totally not from tiktok 🥴 but trump should go ✨d i e  i n  a  h o l e✨ 😌💅
attributes.title: this app ✨s u c k s✨

attributes.review: Okay apple, I am not a part of whatever that gen z thing I saw previously on the reviews are, however I would like to complain abt this app. I downloaded it to potentially give trump some leeway in the fact that his plans will change. However, when I opened the app one my phone crashed( had to reboot everything), secondly when I turned my phone back on the app was still glitching like I could barely scroll!!!
attributes.title: Okay soo

attributes.review: hello, so i downloaded this app to see the oranges campaign. i’m a huge one direction fan so i went to the “bands” feature on the app. i tapped on niall (my fav 🥰😜) and boom my dad died. so i was like what the! and then i tried it again and it took me to spencer reid’s page and i wasn’t complaining. then boom! my phone was just filled with the entire bee movie scrip! it glitched my whole phone out! and here’s the worst part! a big trump appeared on my phone! when i tried to delete the app it wouldn’t go. so i went to text my cousin and all i could text was “trump2020”. now in my family those words are a sin, so my family disowned me. now my dads dead, my phones glitched, and i’m homeless. anyway biden 2020
attributes.title: niall horan, spencer reid, bee movie  👁👄👁

attributes.review: I couldn’t imagine how the great or should I say greatest orange president could have such a horrible app but the reviews are correct. First they wanted my cell phone number like some socialist scheme. Now my phone has been hacked and all my information has been sent to the Russians. I’m pretty sure those nasty democrats had something to do with it. Until he fixes it I suggest you never download it.
attributes.title: You should listen to the reviews first.

attributes.review:
When I first got this app I was really excited but as i started using it more and more it would do weird things to my phone. Got example sometimes my pictures would get deleted and then come back edited with disgusting things. And one time I was trying to text my job group chat and it kept autocorrecting to racial slurs. I definitely know that this app was the problem and NEVER DOWNLOAD THE APP 

ALSO TRUMP 2020 ... written on a gravestone🧚🏽‍♂️✨✨
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app so I could get updates about my favorite narcissist, our dear president🇺🇸. But when I opened the app 📱all the oranges 🍊in my house would start flying 🧚🏻‍♀️around the room. One day I was at the store with my family 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧 and we were in the fruit section 🛒and I opened the app causing all the oranges 🍊to fling towards my family. My mom has a broken nose 👃🏻and my sister has trama🥴.
attributes.title: Made my whole family get attacked by flying oranges
